joke: It is scientifically impossible for Chuck Norris to have had a mortal father. The most popular theory is that he went back in time and fathered himself.
How do you know if the moon is going broke? It's down to its last quarter.
A neutron walks into a bar and asks the bartender how much for a drink. 'For you, no charge'
An infectious disease enters a bar. The bartender says, 'We don't serve your kind here.' It replies, 'Well, you're not a very good host!
Why does a burger have less energy than a steak? A burger is in its ground state!
What do you call an educated tube? A graduated cylinder!
In an average living room there are 1,242 objects Chuck Norris could use to kill you, including the room itself.
My friend, Power, has been super stressed all week. His boss keeps making him work overtime. (P=W/t)
There are 10 kinds of people in this world. Those who understand binary, and those who don't.
Why can't you trust atoms? They make up everything!
How many theoretical physicists does it take to screw in a light bulb? Two. One to hold the bulb and one to rotate the Universe.
Why was the JavaScript developer sad? Because he didn't Node how to Express himself.
In order to understand recursion you must first understand recursion.
